h2_title: How to Find the Supreme Celestial Inspector
content: Make your way into the center of the clearing, where Bajie will exclaim it's a dead end. However, you'll soon be joined by the Supreme Celestial Inspector. If you found all of the Purple Talismans in Chapter 4, then this will be a familiar face to you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Supreme_Celestial_Inspector.md', within the main section titled 'Supreme Celestial Inspector', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Supreme Celestial Inspector'.
The content is as follows:
Make your way into the center of the clearing, where Bajie will exclaim it's a dead end. However, you'll soon be joined by the Supreme Celestial Inspector. If you found all of the Purple Talismans in Chapter 4, then this will be a familiar face to you.
